Quote: If our testimonies are strong onthis point and if we feel the absolute assurance that God loves us, we will change our questons. We won't ask, 'Why did this happen?' or 'Why doesn't God care about me?' Instead, our questions will become, 'What can I learn from this experience?' or 'How does the Lord want me to handle this?
Author: John Bytheway,  When Times Are Tough: 5 Scriptures That Will Help You Get Through Almost Anything
